name: Double Pong Original
description:
*Apps On Sale*
Get one now while it lasts! Thank You For Playing! Enjoy!
Tired of old gameplay with one click taps? The game to challenge your senses is here! Play at your own risk! The balls will not forgive.
- No IAPs, No Ads, No micro transactions, No data requirements, Unlimited Play Gameplay
- Ball at the top must not touch the bottom paddle, Ball at the bottom must not touch the top paddle.
- Make the two balls bounce simultaneously in order to get 1 point
- Frustratingly simple, frustratingly hard
- Enjoy
